quests.name: Gather the Basics
quests.description: To start breeding trees you will first need some trees to start with. Go and find them! (The reward is a very good base tree to breed traits on.) To breed trees, you have to place two different forestry trees (turn vanilla saplings into forestry saplings by putting them into a treealyzer) near an apiary or similar. If there's bees alive, they'll slowly start to pollinate single leaf blocks. Make yourself some spectacles to be able to spot them and mine them by grafter so you definitely get the mutated sapling.

quests.name: Bee Prepared!
quests.description: All these bees you can find in the overworld. Most bee species can be bred from those. Better don't try to breed anything before you've made more drones of each species!

quests.name: Breed, Breed, Breed
quests.description: You've started your very own journey into breeding and genetic superbeeings. Just look out to always make a stable breed, once you've reached a valuable new species. What is a stable breed you may ask. Well, it's easy. When you obtain a new species, you don't just get bees with all the same traits. They are randomized from the basic traits of the new breed, the traits of the princess and the traits of the drone - resulting many different drones coming out of the breeding process. Now, getting a stable breed means, you take all those (semi-)random bees with (semi-)random traits and look for a drone you'd like to further breed your princess with. Each time you breed a princess with a drone, both get random traits from their parents - so there is a chance to have all the traits stable (the same value on active AND inactive). So you either chose the drones with the best traits or the drones with the traits most similar to those of the princess - it's up to you. As soon as all the outcoming drones stack, your breed is stable.

quests.name: Treealyze
quests.description: Now you can start breeding traits. Make an oak tree super tall or make your common beech yield apples. Wanna see a single tree drop 3 stacks of apples? Well, now you can. (Solum bees only have an offspring of 1, maybe consider breeding them with a species with a better outcome.)

quests.name: Collecting The Species
quests.description: So what? It's a cherry tree you can grow on a hill. Get over yourself, we can't make something creative for all of these quest texts.

quests.name: Collecting The Species 2
quests.description: Plums make prunes, and prunes make you swear off mexican food forever.

quests.name: Beealyze
quests.description: Now you can start breeding traits. Make a bee producing diamonds throwing it's babies at you. (Ignis bees only have an offspring of 1, maybe consider breeding them with a species with a better outcome.)

quests.name: Honey Pot
quests.description: Start making your way into creating Alvearys to increase Production. You'll need to breed your bees up to Industrious and Imperial bees for the Pollen and Royal Jelly. Use those matierials in a carpenter to produce scented paneling, use the paneling to coat impregnated casings and voila!, Alveary blocks

quests.name: Machines Bee Needed.
quests.description: Now that you've begun breeding and harvesting the goods from bees and trees you'll need to create some basic infrastructure to deal with the byproducts. Your journal has rough sketeches for a device that should do just that. Using some of the properties of bronze as a base you can construct a carpenter to further develop your blossoming Apiarist endeavors. You'll also need a way to move fluids around, a reservoir should be helpful in this regard.

quests.name: The Big Squeeze
quests.description: With the carpenter you have the method to construct a device to extract useful liquids such as seed oil from plentiful resources. Construct a squeezer using more of the bronze metal.

quests.name: Hive a Spin!
quests.description: The bees seem to produce combs that contain all sorts of useful ingredients, the problem is they're all locked inside the comb. By constructing a machine that is capable at spinning at high speeds you believe you can extract these materials. Build a Centrifuge and extract your first propolis.

quests.name: Beetopia!
quests.description: After watching the bees produce for you in their apiaries and with some of the construction techniques you've learned utilizing bronze and some of the bee honies you believe it possible to construct the ultimate bee habitat. By combining several blocks made of scented paneling you've determined a multiblock alviary is possible. Construct your new bee home to enjoy the benefits of increased productivity and automation.
